
{{Server function}}
This function returns a [[/string.md|string]] containing the IP address of the [[/player.md|player]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
string getPlayerIP ( player thePlayer )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/player.md|player]]:getIP|ip|}}
===Required Arguments===
* '''thePlayer:''' The [[/player.md|player]] element you want to get the IP of.

===Returns===
Returns a [[/string.md|string]] containing the requested players's IP, or ''false'' if the player passed to the function is invalid.

==Example==
This example prints a player's IP to the chat.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function printIp ( thePlayer )
	outputChatBox ( "IP: " .. getPlayerIP ( thePlayer ), thePlayer )
end
addCommandHandler ( "ip", printIp )
</syntaxhighlight>
